snippet.title: Holiday Party Teaser 1
snippet.description:
Press Kit:  https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/fa6st8ykazww3eqbqo8bg/h?rlkey=d6duyfcmygnxupg5ff1iypsu0&dl=0
Coming to your PC 2024

Welcome to the craziest "Holiday Party" ever! Get ready to dive into a party game where holiday-themed stages burst with laughter and excitement. Gather up to 8 of your wildest friends and brace yourself for a thrilling battle like no other.

Prepare to be immersed in a vibrant world of festivities as you embark on a hilarious journey through many stages inspired by your favorite holidays.

Who needs your typical swords and shields when you can slam your friends and foes with a variety of gigantic hammers? Prepare for uproarious battles that will have you doubled over with laughter.

Why is our game so delightfully weird? The truth is, there's no rhyme or reason.
Just gather your crew, unleash your sense of humor, and let the festivities begin!
#indiegame #indiedev #dailymotivation 
#HolidayParty #gamedev #innerstrength #newgame #videogames #indiegame 
#3d 

The Holiday Party video game from NAMSON Digital is coming soon.  
Add to your Wishlist on Steam here.
http://holiday-party.com/
